name: Ultimate Grilled Cheese
author: pratham
summary: A classic grilled cheese taken to another level with the simplest ingredients and a little time. I recommend serving with a bowl of tomato soup.
ingredients: 1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons salted butter, at room temperature
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives, or to taste
directions: Assemble the sandwich by placing Cheddar and mozzarella cheese on the bread
Season with oregano, salt, and pepper
Heat butter in a pan over medium-low heat
Add sandwich and cook until cheeses melt, 3 to 5 minutes, increasing heat if needed
Flip and cook until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes more
Cut in half and top with parsley and chives
